name: PuzzleBox - Puzzles Collection
description:
Fond of classic puzzles but tired of so many separate single puzzle games? Puzzle Box is a mystery box. It is a collection of addictive logic puzzles, including Flow, Tangram, Escape, One Stroke, Blocks, Plumber, Fill, Rolling Ball, Sudoku, Weave a Line, Huedoku and Number Link. More free games are on their way to your puzzle kingdom!
If you are a fan of classic logic puzzles, Puzzle Box will be the best one stroke. Come and challenge the puzzle flow free, gain the jigsaw pieces and build your kingdom.

Currently these logic puzzles have been collected in Puzzle Box. We promise, one line one stroke.
※ Flow ※
Connect dots with same color to create a Flow at free time. When you draw one line, please make sure not to weave the line into another and all spaces on the board be filled.

※ Tangram ※
Move the colored tangrams to fill up the board, a classic dissection Chinese puzzle. Tangram is a jigsaw. The goal is filling the entire board by dragging the geometric shapes. Tangram is a great reasoning puzzle that trains your spatial intelligence.

※ Escape ※
Escape is a famous game called Chinese Sliding-Block. Move the yellow block to find the exit and escape from the room. This game burns brain and tests your observation skills.

※ One Stroke ※
One Stroke, has another name one line one stroke. In One Stroke, you merely need to draw one line. One single line to link all points and form a nice pattern.

※ Blocks ※
Blocks is similar with Tangram. Different shapes of blocks in jigsaw box. Drag the block, move it onto the board and match the right place.

※ Plumber ※
Plumber also called Pipes. Simply turn the different pipe pieces by touching them and connect all of them to make the flows work free (that's the work of a plumber!)

※ Fill ※
The rule of Fill is extremely simple. Just fill in all blocks by using one line. Therefore, choosing which block to get started is pretty important.

※ Rolling Ball ※
Rolling ball is a path guiding game that you need to slide the blocks to create a channel which makes the ball move from the start point to the end.

※ Sudoku ※
Classic Sudoku for beginners and advanced players. Whether you’d like to relax or keep your mind active, pass time in a pleasant way!

※ Weave a Line ※
Drag any line to a point and divide it into two new lines. Weave the lines and drag them to shape certain patterns.

※ Huedoku ※
Huedoku is a hue blend sudoku, which challenges your ability to distinguish and arrange colors. If you like both hue and sudoku, it’s always an option!

※ Number Link ※
Number Link is a classic free Japanese puzzle also known as Lines or Arukone. Connect the pairs of numbers without leaving any empty square on the board.

※ More puzzles are coming soon ※
Thousands of new levels are under designing and more logic puzzles will be added in. Try your best to build your own puzzle kingdom!
